projects.title: Code Labellar
projects.description: Web application enabling admins to create surveys and students to review and tag code snippets.

projects.title: Trivia Game
projects.description: Created a robust multiplayer quiz game on AWS and GCP, promoting real-time competition against the system.

projects.title: Course Alert
projects.description: Developed a cloud-based application that allows students to subscribe and receive customized updates

experience.title: Language-Independent Framework
experience.description: Designed and developed a Language-Independent baseline generation tool using Java and MATLAB, adhering to MathWorks Advisory Board (MAB) guidelines. Refactored code to reduced technical debt. Authored article of Confluence pages. Tool fixed the issue of redundant baselines by 25%.

experience.title: Functional Block Enhancement
experience.description: Troubleshooted and resolved a persistent MATLAB Function block’s dimension issue using Java, enhancing Simulink-MATLAB integration and reducing bugs by about 40%.

experience.title: Activity Scheduler
experience.description: Collaboratively created REST APIs and JWT authentication system using Spring framework(Java), attained code coverage of 80% using JUnit, followed Agile to deliver quality product, documented using Confluence pages, improved managerial oversight by tracking employees’ key-metrics.
